Articles.Content:
SpaceKitten here.

Been playing KSP for a while (since October 2014, full version), and been lurking on the forums for a bit as well. Guess it's about time I say something here.

Something.

OK then. Well. Hello, anyway!

You better get a cute kitten in a space suit as your avatar.

Now that that's out of the way, welcome to the forums, speeccceee kitteeehhhhh!

Well, at least you are not calling yourself RocketCat, which is the favored (and somewhat impatient) cat at Nyrath's Atomic Rocket site. Besides, SpaceKitten seems like a nice name for the kind of cat that a Kerbal would soothingly pet, gently strap into a command capsule and then with glazed eyes and a subtle chuckle, launch the craft at full throttle on a one way flight. Seriously though, welcome to the forums and happy building and flying!
